io.mpos.errors
Interface MposError

public interface MposError

Encapsulates the information about an error, offering specific error descriptions and recovery information.

Since:
2.0.0

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getDeveloperInfo()
          A more specific description of the error, also gives hints on how to resolve it.
 ErrorSource getErrorSource()
          Provides the general source of the error.
 ErrorType getErrorType()
          Returns the more precise error type
 java.lang.Exception getException()
          Returns the causing exception if any.
 java.lang.String getInfo()
          A human readable description of the error
 boolean isSdkError()
          Checks if the Error resulted from the framework domain.
 

Method Detail

getErrorSource

ErrorSource getErrorSource()
Provides the general source of the error.

Returns:
The source of the error
Since:
2.0.0

getErrorType

ErrorType getErrorType()
Returns the more precise error type

Returns:
A error type that describes the error
Since:
2.0.0

getInfo

java.lang.String getInfo()
A human readable description of the error

Returns:
The description localized in the phone's language
Since:

getDeveloperInfo

java.lang.String getDeveloperInfo()
A more specific description of the error, also gives hints on how to resolve it.

Returns:
A developer facing message
Since:
2.0.0

getException

java.lang.Exception getException()
Returns the causing exception if any.

Returns:
The exception that caused the Error or null if there is none.
Since:
2.0.0

isSdkError

boolean isSdkError()
Checks if the Error resulted from the framework domain.

Returns:
True iff the domain is the SDK
Since:
2.0.0
